com.magnet.connection

Interface ConnectionService


  • @Dynamic
@Contract
public interface ConnectionService
    Logical abstraction for a connection-oriented service.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getBaseUri()
      The base URI used for this connection.
      boolean isAuthenticated()
      Returns true if the connection to the server is established with a user that has been authenticated.
      boolean isConnected()
      Returns true if the connection to the server is established.
      boolean isConnecting()
      Returns true if the connection to the server is being established.
      void tryConnect()
      Attempts connection to the remote [server] location.

    • Method Detail

      • tryConnect

        void tryConnect()
        Attempts connection to the remote [server] location. This operation is usually async / non-blocking. and will broadcast a ConnectionServiceListener.onConnectionEvent(ConnectionService, com.magnet.connection.ConnectionServiceListener.Event) to all listeners updating them on the connection status changes.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns true if the connection to the server is established.

      • isAuthenticated

        boolean isAuthenticated()
        Returns true if the connection to the server is established with a user that has been authenticated.

      • isConnecting

        boolean isConnecting()
        Returns true if the connection to the server is being established.

      • getBaseUri

        String getBaseUri()
        The base URI used for this connection.
